name: Thanh Mai Hotel
address: 170 Ngo Quyen, Tan An Ward, Buôn Ma Thuột, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Buôn Ma Thuột, cách Trung tâm thương mại Vincom Plaza Buôn Ma Thuột 2.4 km, Thanh Mai Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có hồ bơi ngoài trời, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, trung tâm thể dục và phòng chờ chung. Ngoài Wi-Fi miễn phí, khách sạn 3 sao này còn cung cấp sân hiên và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp dịch vụ phòng, quầy lễ tân 24 giờ và tổ chức các tour du lịch cho khách.

Tại khách sạn, khách sẽ tìm thấy nhà hàng phục vụ ẩm thực Mỹ, Anh và Pháp. Bên cạnh đó, họ có thể yêu cầu món chay.

Khách có thể chơi bi-a và trò phi tiêu tại Thanh Mai Hotel. Ngoài ra, chỗ nghỉ có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Buôn Ma Thuột, cách chỗ nghỉ 6 km.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The best hotel we stayed in all our trip! Clean comfortable and modern! Very nice staff and rich breakfast. We also rented a scooter from the hotel and had a trip to Yok Don National Park and they helped us with everything! A chill evening at the terrace pool with cocktails was a very pleasant touch to our otherwise hectic journey!
review.comment_negative: Perfect

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Nice newly renovated hotel. The room was clean and comfy. The pool area looked really nice, however I didn't use it because it was pretty cold. 

They also offered "afternoon tea party" and have some decorations for Têt in the lobby for those who'd like to take pictures.

Staff is very friendly, professional and helpful.
review.comment_negative: It's WAY TOO LOUD. There is no soundproofing whatsoever. I booked this hotel because I had to wfh in the evening and it's almost impossible to. Everything happening outside the door I could hear clearly from inside. Loud screaming children, loud yelling adults, shouting, talking. And then, they also have an event hall on the fourth floor and on my last night there, there was loud music and horrible karaoke for HOURS on end. I heard everything in my room. No chance to be working or having a meeting since I couldn't even think straight with all the crappy "singing". With the price I really didn't expect this level of noises.

review.comment_positive: The food was okay but the chef is like he really love his job and pay attention. The staffs take good care of us even when this is a big hotel (in a city like Buon Ma Thuot), really supportive and really fast 😊. Even the girl from the ground floor bar!

review.comment_positive: The bed was big and the hotel was situated near the centre.
review.comment_negative: The bath creaked, the tap fell off and the water pressure was too low.  The room was said to have a window.  It did have a window that was 1 metre opposite a wall to an internal courtyard.  The hotel has major issues with the door locks everytime a guest opened a door an alarm sounded and this could be heard all day and night.  The sound of the elevator was loud.  Breakfast was of poor quality especially the drinks.  The hotel were very slow to respond to messages and did not keep their promise to help us hire a motorbike.

review.comment_positive:
Schönes großes Zimmer. 
Es gab die Möglichkeit Billiard oder Tischfußball zu spielen. 

Auch wenn in Buan Ma Thuot kaum jemand englisch spricht haben sie sich sehr viel Mühe gegeben. 
An der Rezeption konnten sie uns immer sehr gut weiterhelfen (auch in Englisch) 

Gutes Frühstücksbüffet, hauptsächlich mit lokalem Essen.
review.comment_negative:
Leider ist die Dusche so konzipiert, dass das Wasser beim duschen nicht nur in der Badewanne bleibt, sondern sich auch im ganzen Bad verteilt.
Das ist aber wohl ein allgemeines Problem in Vietnam. Ist auch nicht weiter schlimm.

review.comment_positive: Personál byl profesionální a milý,bazén byl čistý a udržovaný. Restaurace vařila výborně,měli jsme mořské plody a můžeme doporučit. Do lepší restaurace mimo hotel se muselo jít trošku dál do centra. Snídaně byla hodně pestrá,akorát se člověk musí připravit,že evropskou styl v ní nenajde. Je tam hodně smaženého a pouze asijská. Ale to nám nevadilo,proto jsme jeli do Vietnamu poznat jiné zvyky.
review.comment_negative: V koupelně byl sprchový kout nekrytý a hned vedle záchoda,takže voda stříkala všude, i když jsme se snažili být maximálně opatrní. Celá místnost pak byla dost mokrá.

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
- The price is good for a 3 night stay, and the location is near the city center with a lot of local restaurants nearby. 
- The morning buffet is acceptable, with avrage variety of food  selection. 
- The rooftop is quite nice with open space
- The staff was very helpful
review.comment_negative:
-The interior of the room requires renovation. We stayed in room 308 with a broken soap container in the shower.  Also, room 308 does not look exactly like the picture that booking.com displayed. 
-The billard room's AC are broken with no cold air 
-The elevator in the reception area is dirty and old 
-The fitness area needs to include more machines instead of two treadmills, 2 bike machines, and a multipurpose weight machine. It is recommended to include a pull-up and dip station ; rack of dummbells up to 30kg because the room still has space and it does not take up a lot of space. 
-In overall:
- highly recommend checking out the rooms before payment because the hotel has nice rooms with newly renovated bathrooms, but we ended up with room 308 in below-average condition. The other rooms, such as 309 , 310 and the newly renovated section of the hotel, are very nice

Staffs weren't that friendly when I came to ask for help. For example, when I wanted to book for motorcycles, with a better service they could of called the provider, not just gave me a phone numbers and let myself call the guy.
Breakfast hours lasted until 9 as announced but around 8.15 am food were off the table gradually and they didn't want to refill the food. 
Around 8.45 am I wanted to have yogurts and they said they ran out so we just sat for another 30 mins chatting and when we decided to leave they had the yogurts back again 😑

review.comment_positive:

- Clean room
- Rooftop bar
- Gym
- Pool
- Friendly staff and services
- Close-by market and other food vendors.

At breakfast, I was looking for some bò kho or cà ri gà to dip with bread but there wasn't any. Not a big deal though.

Neighbors dogs can randomly bark at night so it's best to get some ear blockers.

review.comment_positive: Service from the hotel is so good, staffs are quick and friendly in response to customers' request. Breakfast in here is good too, it would not be extremely good but very much fits my taste. The hotel is located in center of the city, very near to a market where I can buy stuffs and near to restaurants, coffee shops. This one is so well-worth staying for vacation.
review.comment_negative: Nothing much about this hotel I don't like. Only few things such as: check-out seems to be a bit slow, parking lot is quite small; other facilities for examples game room, pool, sauna are quite small and not so interesting.

review.comment_positive: This place was fabulous, we arrived and were immeadiately treated to lovely afternoon tea, kids played pool and games in the games room and we hang out on the rooftop lounge, swimming pool was totally freezing but still fun!  kids got up early to use the gym, breakfast was super lots to choose from, totally wonderful place my new standard for comfortable travel
review.comment_negative: nothing it was brilliant

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Very nice hotel located in the city center. The rooms are clean, modern, and comfortable. There is a cocktail bar (super good cocktails btw!) and a pool on the rooftop. We were also able to rent a motorbike easily.

The breakfast buffet was good, although there was little to no option for vegetarian, and there could be more fresh fruits available.

The staff is helpful and friendly. Overall, We really enjoyed our stay there and totally recommend this place!
